The '''Beaumont Series''' ''(unofficial name)'' is a 4-star [[Weapon Series]].

All weapons in this series can be [[Forging|forged]]. Forging these weapons notably require {{Item|Midlander Billet Trove|link=Midlander Billet|text=Midlander Billets|30}} and {{Item|Condessence Crystal|text=Condessence Crystals|30}}, among other materials. The diagrams for all weapons in this series are sold by [[Estelle]] at [[Beaumont Workshop]].

Only [[Finale of the Deep]] and [[Flowing Purity]] share the [[Bond of Life]] passive, while the other three in the series have passives relating to being [[Healing|healed]].
